full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL PO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I GSER SKYEMS BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , ` CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL PO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I GSER SKYEMS BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES SRID GSUM BDAG MO DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I GSER SKYEMS BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAL KUN MKHYEN BRTZE DUS GSUM GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I BDAG NYID 'PHAGS MCHOG PHYAG NA PADMAR NGUR SMRIG GAR GYIS RNAM PAR ROL BA RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN CING GZIGS PA CHEN PO LA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS BKA' STZAL BA SPYI BOR NOS TE, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR NAS BUL BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
